mean_cn: n. 遗产，继承物，传统，文化遗产
mean_en: something which one receives by right from an old member of the family to the younger
word_etyma: herit继承 + age名词后缀 → heritage 遗产
short_phrase: The temple is part of our heritage.
sentence: The old couple are considering how to distribute their heritage.
sentence_trans: 老夫妇在考虑如何分配他们的遗产。
